title: error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I'm back. This time I tried concatenating non-literal `&'static str`s. ### Code ```Rust #![allow(incomplete_features)] #![feature(adt_const_params, const_ptr_read, generic_const_exprs)] use std::mem::ManuallyDrop; const fn concat_strs() -> &'static str where [(); A.len()]:, [(); B.len()]:, [(); A.len() + B.len()]:, { #[repr(C)] struct ConcatJoin { left: [u8; N], right: [u8; M], } #[repr(C)] union ConcatJoiner where [(); N + M]:, { whole: ManuallyDrop<[u8; N + M]>, split: ManuallyDrop>, } const fn concat_arr(a: [u8; M], b: [u8; N]) -> [u8; M + N] where [(); M + N]:, { unsafe { let joiner = ConcatJoiner { split: ManuallyDrop::new(ConcatJoin { left: a, right: b }), }; let join = joiner.whole; ManuallyDrop::into_inner(join) } } struct Inner; impl Inner where [(); A.len()]:, [(); B.len()]:, [(); A.len() + B.len()]:, { const ABSTR: &'static str = unsafe { std::str::from_utf8_unchecked(&concat_arr( A.as_ptr().cast::<[u8; A.len()]>().read(), B.as_ptr().cast::<[u8; B.len()]>().read(), )) }; } Inner::::ABSTR } const FOO: &str = "foo"; const BAR: &str = "bar"; const FOOBAR: &str = concat_strs::(); ``` Why? Excellent question, next please. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.68.0-nightly (9c07efe84 2022-12-16) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9c07efe84f28a44f3044237696acc295aa407ee5 commit-date: 2022-12-16 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.68.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.6 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: no errors encountered even though `delay_span_bug` issued error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:41 ~ newice[4270]::concat_strs::{impl#0}::ABSTR) (NoSolution): could not prove Binder(WellFormed([(); _]), []) | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/canonical.rs:148:13 error: internal compiler error: broken MIR in DefId(0:41 ~ newice[4270]::concat_strs::{impl#0}::ABSTR) (NoSolution): could not prove Binder(WellFormed([u8; _]), []) --> src/lib.rs:50:17 | 50 | B.as_ptr().cast::<[u8; B.len()]>().read(), | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ | = note: delayed at compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/type_check/canonical.rs:148:13 thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1610:13 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f8a020b2d5a -
